task.summary: Default task
Implemented stage1 5x5 camera cross and position lock camera
Managed to get auto-scroll camera; still needs proper player movement
Removed serialized fields from stage 1, as project specs do not require them
FrameAutoScrollCameraController.cs now auto scrolls properly with bounding box
Setting up stage3 script
Changed SerializedFields access from public to private
Better comment formatting according to style guidelines
Setting up stage3 script
Smooth camera movement for stage 3; start position update is bugged still
Correct camera smoothing and player tracking implemented for moving and stopping
Additional fine-tuning to camera smoothing
Massive code and logic cleanup.
Implemented PushBox camera boundaries if player moves too far.
Minor formatting; finished with stage 3.
Began stage 4 skeleton code
Implemented stage 4
Minor formatting;
github issue apparently did not submit stage 5 after checking just now!
Unity settings resaved
Once again reset DrawLogic to be enabled for all for immediate testability.

MESSAGE.value: Implemented stage1 5x5 camera cross and position lock camera
Managed to get auto-scroll camera; still needs proper player movement
Removed serialized fields from stage 1, as project specs do not require them
FrameAutoScrollCameraController.cs now auto scrolls properly with bounding box
Changed SerializedFields access from public to private
Better comment formatting according to style guidelines
Smooth camera movement for stage 3; start position update is bugged still
Correct camera smoothing and player tracking implemented for moving and stopping
Implemented PushBox camera boundaries if player moves too far.
github issue apparently did not submit stage 5 after checking just now!
Once again reset DrawLogic to be enabled for all for immediate testability.
